casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Alexis SANCHEZ, Appellant. Motion No: 2018-402 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided April 26, 2018

Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Richard Wojszwilo, Esq., 11 Park Place, Suite 903, New York, NY 10007 assigned as counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
